name: Eternal Moon
description:
The story is about a young orphan magician who after graduation from the magic guild has dreams of greatness, he must start from the bottom at a very difficult time for his species, who due to their greed for power began to experiment with the Moon crystals causing a vengeful power on the part of nature, the moon began to release more crystals to the planet from which spiteful monsters originated that only seek to extinguish these living beings and achieve balance on the planet again.

Moon crystals

  In the video game they are the essence of all living beings, from them life is born and when they die in these crystals they become, by refining them these beings managed to create artificial light and power crystals both for protection and destruction.

Alpha 0.1 release feature:

-There are 2 levels of difficulty: normal,hard.

-2 languages: English, Español.

-It has touch controls that can be activated and deactivated at any time.

-3 types of enemies

-2 save points.

-The character has an inventory, a map, and a feature book about quests, spells, and monsters.

-2 missions to complete for now.

-Only 1 spell to perform for now.

-1 village with: inn, shop, smithy, quest post, various villagers and magicians.

-(For now the video game has no sound).
